Title: groupArraySample
Description: Creates an array of sample argument values. The size of the resulting array is limited to max_size elements. Argument values are selected and added to the array randomly.
max_size — Maximum size of the resulting array. UInt64.seed — Seed for the random number generator. Optional. UInt64. Default value: 123456.x — Argument (column name or expression).
Array of randomly selected x arguments.
Examples: SELECT groupArraySample(3)(color) as newcolors FROM colors;
SELECT groupArraySample(3, 987654321)(color) as newcolors FROM colors;
SELECT groupArraySample(3)(concat('light-', color)) as newcolors FROM colors;
